dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5234 IH: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to expand opportunities for algae-based research, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Soto introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to expand opportunities for algae-based research, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 9011(a)(6)(C) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 8111(a)(6)(C)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating clauses (v) through (vii) as clauses (iv) through (vi), respectively.
